Leebada

Korean: 이바다

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Lee Ba-da
Native name:
이바다
Birthday:
Oct 29, 1992
Age:
32 years old

Introduction

Leebada (이바다) is a South Korean singer-songwriter under PLANB Entertainment. She debuted with the single "You Got Me" on May 4, 2015. She was a contestant on Artistock Game and Sing Again 3.
